body_html:
@aaroey sorry for belated reply. I've addressed the failures found in the CI process. Could you help re-run the test?

Also I noticed git clang-format may result in different indentation with what's expected by CI. Could you let me know the proper formatting instruction should I use?

body:
@aaroey sorry for belated reply. I've addressed the failures found in the CI process. Could you help re-run the test?

Also I noticed `git clang-format` may result in different indentation with what's expected by CI. Could you let me know the proper formatting instruction should I use?
